page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: My first hobby is horse riding.I have been greatly interested in animals ever since I was little so when I was nine I started riding.For my eleventh birthday I was given a pony by my parents.He is called Cider and is four years old.Since then Ihave learned a great deal more and to be honest I have fallen off a great deal more too. I go to Harlequin Studios in Peacehaven where I do rock and roll,disco and modern.I am in the rock and roll team which consists of nine people and is called Harlequinade.I go to lessons three times a week.Harlequinade has recently represented England in Belgium where we came first in the show dance teams. Every Friday we go to Guides where we do all sorts of interesting things.
